summary: Implements the clinical workflow for managing acute lower respiratory infections, assessing each presentation, classifying disease severity, deciding inpatient or outpatient care, delivering appropriate treatments, handling referrals, and scheduling follow‑up actions across all health system levels.
business_intent: Provide a reusable simulation component that replicates real‑world pneumonia care pathways, enabling accurate evaluation of treatment protocols, resource utilization, and patient outcomes within health system models.
